gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 113, Pistons 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Pistons, 113-91. Paolo Banchero led the way for the Magic with 29 points (10-16 FG), eight rebounds and five assists, while Markelle Fultz added 16 points (8-8 FG) in the victory. Evan Fournier put up 17 points and five assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Magic have won three straight games as they improve to 35-26 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 9-51.
